Comparação do Gradle com outras ferramentas de build
Configuração do Ambiente: Instalação e configuração do Gradle - Parte 2
Fundamentos do Gradle Pratica 1 e 2: Tasks do Gradle- o que são e como executar e criar tasks simples
Fundamentos do Gradle Pratica 3: Fundamentos do Gradle - Pratica 3 - Parte 3 e 4

requirements: Ter um computador ou um celular conectado a Internet
Uma compreensão básica de Java e Kotlin
courses.description:
Seja bem-vindo ao nosso curso de Gradle para Android Starter Mod! Aqui, você será introduzido ao poderoso mundo do Gradle e seu papel essencial no desenvolvimento de aplicativos Android. Vamos explorar desde os conceitos fundamentais até técnicas avançadas, capacitando-o a dominar o Gradle em seus projetos Android.
Por que o Gradle é Fundamental para Projetos Android?
O Gradle é uma ferramenta de automação de compilação e gerenciamento de dependências que se tornou o padrão de fato no desenvolvimento Android. Neste curso, você descobrirá por que o Gradle é tão crucial para o sucesso de seus projetos Android. Desde a eficiência na construção até a gestão de dependências, o Gradle oferece uma gama de vantagens que impulsionam o desenvolvimento Android.
Explorando o Ecossistema Android com o Gradle
Entender o ecossistema Android é vital para qualquer desenvolvedor. Neste curso, mergulharemos na relação entre o Gradle e o ecossistema Android, destacando como o Gradle simplifica e otimiza o processo de desenvolvimento. Você aprenderá como o Gradle se integra perfeitamente com as ferramentas e frameworks Android, aumentando sua produtividade e eficácia.
Comparando o Gradle com Outras Ferramentas de Build
Embora existam várias ferramentas de construção disponíveis, o Gradle se destaca como uma escolha superior para projetos Android. Durante o curso, faremos uma comparação detalhada entre o Gradle e outras ferramentas de build, destacando as razões pelas quais o Gradle se destaca em termos de desempenho, flexibilidade e funcionalidades específicas do Android.
Configuração do Ambiente: Preparando-se para o Sucesso
Antes de mergulharmos nos detalhes do Gradle, é crucial configurar o ambiente corretamente. Nesta seção, você aprenderá como instalar e configurar o Gradle e o Android Studio para aproveitar ao máximo suas capacidades. Além disso, exploraremos a estrutura básica de um arquivo build.gradle, preparando-o para uma compreensão mais profunda dos conceitos que virão.
Fundamentos do Gradle: Construindo uma Base Sólida
Dominar os fundamentos do Gradle é essencial para se tornar um desenvolvedor Android competente. Ao longo desta seção, abordaremos conceitos-chave, incluindo o Gradle Wrapper, tasks do Gradle e gerenciamento de dependências. Você sairá desta seção com uma compreensão sólida dos princípios fundamentais do Gradle e sua aplicação no contexto do desenvolvimento Android.
Utilizando o Gradle no Desenvolvimento Android
Nesta seção principal do curso, mergulharemos profundamente na integração do Gradle com o desenvolvimento Android. Exploraremos a estrutura de um projeto Android com Gradle, analisaremos detalhadamente o arquivo build.gradle e discutiremos estratégias avançadas para gerenciamento de dependências e variantes de build. Ao final desta seção, você estará apto a otimizar o uso do Gradle em seus próprios projetos Android.
Destaques do Curso:
Instalação e Configuração do Gradle
Estrutura Básica de Arquivos build.gradle
Tasks do Gradle e Seu Papel no Processo de Build
Gestão Eficiente de Dependências em Projetos Android
Exploração Profunda da Integração do Gradle com o Desenvolvimento Android
Ao concluir este curso, você estará equipado com o conhecimento e as habilidades necessárias para aproveitar todo o potencial do Gradle em seus projetos Android. Prepare-se para elevar suas habilidades de desenvolvimento Android ao próximo nível com o nosso Curso de Gradle para Android Starter Mod!
Não perca tempo, inscreva-se agora e inicie sua jornada rumo à maestria do Gradle no desenvolvimento Android!
target_audience: Desenvolvedores de todos os níveis
Desenvolvedores Android
Desenvolvedores Flutter
Desenvolvedores Swift

courses.title: Swift & SwiftUI: Курс. С нуля до первого iOS-приложения
courses.bio: Полный путь от основ Swift и SwiftUI до интерактивных интерфейсов, работы с данными, сохранения настроек в iOS App
objectives: Поймут основы языка Swift: переменные, типы данных, условия, циклы, функции, структуры, классы и протоколы.
Научатся работать с SwiftUI: создавать интерфейсы с VStack, HStack, ZStack, добавлять кнопки, изображения, списки, навигацию и анимации.
Освоят ключевые механизмы управления состоянием: @State, @Binding, @ObservedObject, @StateObject, @EnvironmentObject.
Смогут создавать интерактивные экраны с формами ввода, переключателями, ползунками и навигацией.
Научатся сохранять данные с помощью UserDefaults и CoreData, а также строить модели данных.
Создадут несколько практических мини-проектов: калькулятор возраста, экран профиля, список покупок, заметки.
Разработают итоговый проект — полноценное приложение ToDo, с добавлением, редактированием, удалением задач и анимациями.
Смогут запустить приложение в симуляторе iPhone и подготовить его к публикации.

Введение: Знакомство
Что такое Swift и SwiftUI (обзор, назначение, отличие от UIKit)
Установка Xcode и первый запуск (симулятор, Canvas, настройка проекта)
Структура проекта SwiftUI и Первый экран
Мини-проект (экран «Привет, мир!», кастомный стиль, запуск на симуляторе)
Основы языка Swift: Переменные и константы (var, let, область видимости, именование переменных)
Типы данных (String, Int, UInt, Double, Float, Bool, Array, Dictionary etc...)
Условные операторы (if, else, switch, guard, ranges, where)
Циклы, функции и перечисления (for-in, while, repeat-while, forEach, func, enum)
Структуры, классы, и протоколы (свойства и методы, наследование, коллекции etc)
Первые шаги в SwiftUI: Layout с VStack, HStack, ZStack Spacer, Divider (порядок элементов, вложенность)
Кнопки и Изображения (Button, Image, действия, стилизация, обработка событий)
Работа с состоянием @State и Привязка данных с @Binding
Мини-проект экран профиля(фото, имя, кнопка «лайк» etc...)
Интерактивность: TextField и SecureField (ввод текста и пароля, привязка через @State и @Binding)
Toggle и Stepper (переключатели и шаговые элементы, привязка к данным)
Slider и Picker (ползунки, выпадающий список, привязка и обработка значений)
Списки List,ForEach, динамическое отображение, взаимодействие с ObservableObject
События onAppear, onChange, onDrag (отслеживание появления, изменений данных...)
Мини-проект «Список покупок» (далее работаем с ним в оставшихся уроках)
Продвинутый UI: Работа с цветами и темами (light/dark mode, Color, ColorScheme)
Анимации: простые переходы (withAnimation) и плавные (opacity, rotation, scale)
Данные и сохранение: UserDefaults (сохранение настроек, чтение и запись данных)

requirements: Предварительных знаний в программировании не требуется — курс подходит для новичков.
Компьютер с macOS (MacBook или iMac).
Базовые навыки работы с компьютером: установка приложений, открытие файлов.
Желание учиться и создавать собственные мобильные приложения.
courses.description:
Этот курс проведёт вас от самых основ Swift и SwiftUI до создания полноценного iOS-приложения.
Вы научитесь работать с переменными, функциями, структурами и классами, создавать интерактивные интерфейсы с кнопками, списками, формами и анимациями. Освоите привязку данных через @State, @Binding, @ObservedObject и @EnvironmentObject, работу с цветами и темами, а также TabView для навигации по вкладкам. Вы научитесь создавать интерактивные экраны с текстовыми полями, переключателями, ползунками и списками.
Особое внимание уделено сохранению данных: вы научитесь использовать UserDefaults для хранения настроек и CoreData для работы с базой данных.
Практические мини-проекты помогут закрепить знания: «Привет, мир!», «Калькулятор возраста», экран профиля с лайком, «Список покупок» и другие.
В конце четвертого модуля, мы создадим мини приложение «Список покупок» на основании пройденных материалов. Затем, мы продолжим работу с ним, в следующих двух модулях. Постепенно добавим туда функционал, согласно текущих тем. Приложение научится хранить настройки в UserDefaults, а так же хранить более сложные данные в CoreData. По итогу, вы получите реальное функциональное приложение, которое создадите своими руками.
Курс идеально подойдёт новичкам, которые хотят создать своё первое iOS-приложение и понять основы современной разработки на Swift и SwiftUI. Пройдя данный курс, вы освоите основы Swift и SwiftUI и сможете начать создавать более сложные интерфейсы используя современные и востребованные технологии. Начать никогда не поздно, Welcome!
target_audience: Полные новички в программировании — если вы никогда не писали код, то начнёте с самых основ и шаг за шагом создадите своё первое приложение.
Начинающие iOS-разработчики — если вы уже знакомы с другими языками или фреймворками, то быстро освоите Swift и SwiftUI и перейдёте к созданию интерфейсов.
Студенты и самоучки, которые хотят освоить мобильную разработку и добавить практические проекты в портфолио.
Хобби-разработчики и энтузиасты, мечтающие создать собственное приложение для iPhone и попробовать себя в iOS-экосистеме.
Будущие Junior iOS-разработчики — этот курс поможет сформировать базу, без которой невозможно двигаться дальше в профессиональной разработке.

courses.title: Introducción a Swift
courses.bio: Variables, constantes, tipos de datos, funciones, todo lo que necesitas saber para comenzar a programar en Swift.
objectives: Familiarizarse con el lenguaje de programación Swift
Comprender el uso de SwiftPlaygrounds en iPad
Conceptos de variables y constantes, tipos de datos, opcionales, enumeraciones, colecciones, etc.
Diferencias principales entre referencia y valor
requirements: Conocimientos de programación en cualquier lenguaje como: kotlin, java, javascript, etc.
courses.description:
Swift es el lenguaje de programación utilizado para desarrollar aplicaciones en iOS, iPadOS, watchOS, tvOS y macOS, además de ser un lenguaje de alto nivel también nos permite programar con diferentes paradigmas, desde el ya muy conocido programación orientada a objetos, hasta programación funcional o programación enfocada a protocolos, en fin, es un lenguaje muy potente que igual tiene algunos usos en la generación de servicios.
En este pequeño curso te llevo de la mano por los temas que, desde mi perspectiva, son importantes conocer para comenzar a programar en este mundo de los SDK's de Apple, desde el ya bien famoso iOS hasta hacer pequeñas apps para watchOS o, ¿por qué no?, visionOS.
Algo que es importante aclarar es que los temas como funciones, estructuras, clases y protocolos son desarrollados de forma básica en el curso, dichos temas son más amplios que lo abarcado en los videos pero igual es una forma de introducirlos a los temas. Dichos temas los intenté tocar de la forma más sencilla posible sin llegar a temas avanzados o complejos, desde mi perspectiva esto es suficiente para continuar con el desarrollo de alguno de los SDKs de Apple.
Si estás buscando un lugar en donde comenzar a familiarizarte con Swift creo que lo encontraste y déjame saber si hay algo en qué mejorar.
target_audience: Desarrolladores que quieren aprender rápidamente Swift

courses.title: Kotlin para principiantes
courses.bio: Aprende las bases de kotlin y prepárate para desarrollar aplicaciones

Introducción: Instalación de Android Studio y AVD [Dispositivo Virutal]
Tipos de Datos: Aplicación real del uso de datos
Tipos de Datos y sus ámbitos
Estructuras de Control: Aplicación real de Estructuras de Control
Programación Modular: Aplicación real de la Programación Modular

requirements: Deseo de aprender
courses.description:
En este curso de Introducción a Kotlin aprenderás de forma básica y muy completa las nociones más elementales sobre el desarrollo de software en este importante lenguaje de programación orientado al desarrollo de aplicaciones para Android. Este curso dará un recorrido por todos los conceptos más básicos para aprender a programar. De hecho a lo largo del curso aprenderás cámo aplicar cada idea, comprobando desde el principio la aplicación de cada uno de los conceptos desarrollados en una aplicación real de un nivel avanzado de desarrollo.
El curso consta de los siguientes bloques principales:
Tipos de Datos
Estructuras de Control de Flujo
Programación Modular
A través de las diferentes secciones podrás ir asimilando las ideas necesarias para construir proyectos más complejos.


Te animo a que veas el temario y cualquiera de las clases que estén accesibles antes de comprar el curso y seguro que desearás ver el resto del curso.


Cada uno de los temas se desarrollará con ejemplos prácticos y explicados en detalle. No importa si no cuentas con conocimientos previos porque todo lo que se enseña es desde cero para que cualquier persona, con o sin antecedentes en la programación, pueda entender las ideas y saber como aplicarlas.
Este es el primer paso en tu formación para ser capaz de desarrollar aplicaciones :)

Todos los conceptos se explican en detalle, paso a paso y entendiendo el por qué de cada cosa. Así podrás sentar las bases desde un principio en tu desarrollo profesional. Este curso es el primer paso en tu formación para ser capaz de desarrollar aplicaciones :)


¿Verdad que es genial? Pues lo mejor de todo es que está a tu alcance.
Entra en el curso y disfruta de todo lo que te está esperando.
Nos vemos!


José Javier Villena
target_audience: Estudiantes de programación
Interesados en crear aplicaciones para android

Meu maior motivador em construir esta caminhada, chamada de curso, é meu desejo em compartilhar com você o que venho aprendendo sobre database do back4app. Este pequeno projeto, usando puro Dart, servirá também para alguns testes e suporte para nossos batepapos.
Antes de começar talvez voĉe se pergunte. Porque back4app ? Ou ate mesmo. O que é back4app ?
Em rápidas palavras foi assim...
Ao iniciar meus estudos em Dart/Flutter fui logo para o Firebase. Então analisando melhor a documentação vi que o Firebase é openCredCard, ou seja, você cadastra seu cartão de crédito e se sua aplicação crescer, ou for atacado ou cometer um erro de loop o Firebase não quer saber. Vai te cobrar e pronto.
Ai buscando outras alternativas, meu grande amigo Paulo Roberto Cruz, me indicou esta solução completa para um backend que outrora foi iniciativa do Facebook mas agora esta nas boas mãos da comunidade.
E aqui estou eu. Após várias cabeçadas compartilhando com vocês o que aprendi. E espero ajudar alguns. E aceito ajuda de todos. Neste repo trato apenas de banco de dados os demais tópicos deixarei indicado meus repos de aprendizado no referido assunto.
No back4app encontramos:
1. Autenticação
2. Banco de dados
3. Hospedagem
4. Funções em nuvem
5. E outras coisas...
target_audience: Para aqueles programadores em Dart/Flutter que precisam de um backend com database, funções em núvem, autenticação, etc. Neste curso trataremos apenas de gerenciar o database com back4app.

courses.title: Android com Firebase Iniciante

courses.description:
Nesse curso iremos aprender a criar um app básico, para o banco de dados, autenticação iremos utilizar o poderoso Firebase, uma tecnologia desenvolvida por ninguém mais, ninguém menos que o GOOGLE, pois é, já imaginou quantas empresas querem um profissional que domine essa tecnologia?



Por meio desse curso e de seu esforço você poderá ingressar na área de desenvolvimento de Apps para Android.
Pesquisas e mais pesquisas indicam o crescimento e a solidez da plataforma Android, cada vez com mais usuários e cada vez com mais necessidade de profissionais para desenvolver nessa área.



Você sabendo Android junto ao Firebase, nada irá te segurar, visto que o Firebase pode ser integrado a qualquer plataforma, seja IOS, ANDROID E WEB.



Quais são os requisitos?
Saber o básico de Android
Lógica de Programação
Básico de Java

O que serei capaz de fazer depois deste curso?
Configurar seu app para utilizar o Firebase;

Real Time Database, banco de dados em tempo real do Firebase;
Desenvolver Apps em Android, utilizando a linguagem Java e um dos mais poderosos, completo e seguro Back-End da atualidade.


Qual é o público-alvo?

Qualquer pessoa que deseja entrar para o universo do desenvolvimento para Android, podendo mudar a sua vida.

courses.title: Corso avanzato di sviluppo di skill per Alexa
courses.bio: Seguimi passo passo nell'aggiunta di funzionalità avanzate quali la presentazione su schermo e la riproduzione di audio.
objectives: Aggiungere la visualizzazione e l'interazione ad una skill quando usata su dispositivi dotati di schermo
Riprodurre contenuti audio con una skill
Utilizzare i parametri di sessione per passare informazioni da un intent all'altro
Memorizzare in modo permanente informazioni

Creare una skill importando i file di co: Creazione della skill, import dei file e test di funzionamento
Lavorare sulla versione in sviluppo e li: Come gestire il bug fixing e l'aggiunta di funzionalità
Modifiche senza nuova verifica con Update live skill

Aggiunta di APL nel codice della skill
Primo test del funzionamento di APL
Passaggio dei parametri di testo dal codice
Prova ad aggiungere APL a RandomSignIntentHandler
Elenco segni zodiacali: caricamento icone. Creazione account su AWS
Elenco segni zodiacali: aggiunta APL nel codice

Elenco segni zodiacali: aggiunta dell’interazione lato grafica
Elenco segni zodiacali: Aggiunta dell’interazione lato codice
Salvataggio delle preferenze: attributi: Modifica di AlexaSignIntent per memorizzare il segno zodiacale generato
Riproduzione di audio: I modi possibili per riprodurre audio
Aggiunta dell’intent ShortSignDescription con audio riprodotto con SSML
Introduzione ad Audio Player Interface e caricamento file di supporto
Aggiunte 2023: Novità della developer console per la creazione di APL

requirements: Conoscenze di programmazione javascript e ambiente Nodejs
Creare una skill per Alexa con ASK SDK
Utilizzo di Intent, Utterance e Slot
courses.description:
In questo corso partiremo da dove siamo arrivati nel corso base ed aggiungeremo insieme funzionalità più avanzate come per esempio:
l'utilizzo di APL per la visualizzazione e l'interazione su dispositivi dotati di schermo
la riproduzione di effetti audio e la riproduzione di file audio
l'utilizzo dei parametri di sessione per passare informazioni da un intent all'altro
il salvataggio di parametri in modo da renderli persistenti rispetto alla sessione
Il corso da per scontate le conoscenze di base dello sviluppo di skill per Alexa come la creazione degli intent e la loro configurazione con utterance e slot e la conoscenza di javascript e dell'ambiente Node.js e del codice necessario per l'interazione degli utenti tramite gli intent.
In questo corso viene utilizzata la skill sviluppata nel corso base come punto di partenza per procedere con le nuove funzionalità. Se non ritieni necessario il corso base non ci sono problemi, in questo corso ti fornirò i sorgenti per poter procedere. In questo modo potrai seguire il percorso che faremo in questo corso avanzato.
Così come per il corso base non è necessario di disporre di account a pagamento su Amazon AWS. Nel corso utilizzeremo la modalità “Alexa Hosted” che contiene tutto il necessario per lo sviluppo sia dell’interazione vocale che del codice in Node.js. Nel corso base viene illustrato come creare un account e come creare una skill. In questo corso queste conoscenze sono date per scontate.
target_audience: Sviluppatori che vogliono imparare tecniche più avanzate di programmazione delle skill per Alexa

courses.title: React-Native: ¡Encuentra trabajo! 100+ preguntas 2025.
courses.bio: ¡Descubre los secretos de las entrevistas de trabajo exitosas!
courses.description:
Preguntas de ejemplo (respuestas en el curso):
¿Cómo abordas la creación de vistas en una aplicación móvil destinada a funcionar en diferentes tipos de dispositivos móviles?
¿Cuál es la diferencia entre los archivos gráficos .svg y .png en términos de optimización en una aplicación móvil?
¿Por qué los nombres de los hooks personalizados deben comenzar con la palabra "use"?
¿Cuáles son los tipos de dependencias en el archivo package.json en React-Native?
¿Qué bibliotecas y hooks de gestión de estado conoces, cuándo es recomendable usarlos y siempre es necesario?
¿De dónde obtienes información sobre las novedades en React-Native?
¿Qué incluye el curso?
En el curso, tendrás acceso a 5 pruebas, cada una con 20 preguntas sobre React-Native. Después de completar cada prueba, recibirás una lista de herramientas y bibliotecas que es importante conocer en cada nivel para ser un candidato atractivo en 2024.
También recibirás un enlace a un archivo de Excel donde podrás evaluar tu nivel (junior, mid, senior, experto) de forma independiente.
¿Para quién es?
¿Estás planeando conseguir tu primer trabajo o cambiar el actual por uno mejor? Descubre qué preguntas puedes esperar en 2024 y conoce las respuestas que los reclutadores esperan de primera mano. Aprende qué herramientas y bibliotecas son altamente demandadas en el mercado y utilizadas en proyectos comerciales.
Sobre mí
Soy desarrollador senior de React-Native y, al mismo tiempo, llevo a cabo procesos de selección de candidatos desde junior hasta senior en esta tecnología. A pesar de la creciente competencia en el mercado, aún es difícil encontrar un desarrollador que pueda trabajar de forma independiente y sea atractivo para los reclutadores. Para un puesto de nivel medio, rechazo a 9 de cada 10 personas después de la entrevista técnica, ¡a pesar de que la selección es más fácil que para un nivel junior! Esto se debe a la falta de conocimiento de las bibliotecas y herramientas comúnmente utilizadas en proyectos comerciales y a la falta de ajuste con el equipo en términos de patrones de diseño.
¿Cuál es el puntaje necesario para aprobar la prueba práctica?
El puntaje de aprobación para cada prueba es del 75%.
¿Las preguntas son de selección única?
Para reflejar mejor el formato de una entrevista y aumentar el nivel de dificultad, las preguntas son de selección única y múltiple, con un límite de tiempo.
¿Puedo realizar la prueba práctica más de una vez?
Puedes realizar cada prueba práctica varias veces. Después de completar la prueba práctica, se publicará tu puntaje final. Con cada intento, el orden de las preguntas y respuestas se asigna aleatoriamente.
¿Hay algún límite de tiempo para las pruebas prácticas?
Cada prueba consta de 20 preguntas y tiene un límite de tiempo de 30 minutos. 1,5 minutos por respuesta en una prueba de opción múltiple es tiempo suficiente, ten en cuenta que en la realidad tendrás que dar tus respuestas de manera verbal.
target_audience: Programadores principiantes que buscan su primer trabajo como desarrolladores de React Native.
Programadores con experiencia que desean cambiar de trabajo o ascender.
Desarrolladores que quieren crecer, pero necesitan orientación sobre qué aprender.

courses.bio: 코틀린을 활용한 안드로이드 앱 개발! 다양한 클래스와 인터페이스 마스터 강의

2. 애노테이션 클래스 선언, 사용 코드, User 클래스 생성, 안드로이드 리플렉션 미지원 실습
3. 표준 애노테이션 @JvmName(), @Throws()를 사용하는 방법 실습
4. 연산자 오버로딩의 개념, 산술, 호출, 인덱스 접근 연산자가 어떤 메서드 호출
5. plus(), minus(), times(), div(), ++, -- 연산자를 클래스 안에 오버로딩, 객체끼리의 연산 실습
6. 호출 연산자 invoke(), 람다식은 invoke() 포함, 인덱스 접근 연산자 get(), set() 실습
7. 단일, 범위, 대입, 복합대입, 동등성 연산자들이 실질적으로 호출하는 함수
8. 단일, 범위, 대입, 복합대입, 동등성 연산자들을 클래스 추가, 해당 함수를 실행 실습

본 강의는 초급자를 위한 과정으로 코틀린을 활용한 안드로이드 앱 개발을 알려드립니다.

안드로이드 앱 개발을 시작하는 초급 수강생

1. 추상 클래스와 인터페이스: 개념 및 구현, 프로퍼티 게터의 구현과 구현의 필요성, 다중 인터페이스 구현, 위임, 커피 제조기 코드의 이해와 실습


2. 데이터 클래스 : 개념, 부수적인 메소드 활용, 객체 디스트럭쳐링, 내부클래스와 중첩 클래스, 지역 클래스와 익명 객체, 실드 클래스, 열거형 클래스의 이해와 실습


3. 애노테이션 : 의미, 선언, 속성, 리플렉션 개념, 표준 애너테이션, Kclass<>와 ::class를 통한 레퍼런스 참조, 실습


4. 연산자 오버로딩 : 개념 이해와 실습, 연산자를 통한 클래스 간 상호작용 학습과 실습

courses.title: SwiftUI: A Beginner's Guide (Hindi)
courses.bio: Zero to Hero
objectives: Understand the Basics of SwiftUI: Students will learn the fundamental concepts and components of SwiftUI, including views, modifiers, and layouts.
Build and Design User Interfaces: Learners will gain the skills to create and design basic user interfaces for iOS apps using SwiftUI, focusing on best practice
Implement Interactivity and Navigation: Students will learn how to add interactivity to their apps with buttons, gestures, and navigation tools, allowing for dy
Develop and Deploy a Simple iOS App: By the end of the course, learners will be able to develop a fully functional iOS application from scratch and understand t

Beginner Swift: Key Concepts and Syntax: Swift Basic: Playground, Print Statement, Comments
TODO App: TextField and Navigation and Property Wrappers

requirements: Mac Computer: Access to a Mac computer running macOS, as Xcode (the development environment for SwiftUI) is required and is only available on macOS.
Interest in iOS Development: A keen interest in developing applications for iOS and a willingness to learn and experiment with new tools and technologies.
No programming experience needed. You will learn everything you need to know
courses.description:
Course Description:
Are you eager to dive into the world of app development but prefer learning in Hindi? Look no further! "Getting Started with SwiftUI: Build Your First App (Hindi)" is the perfect course for beginners who want to learn Swift and SwiftUI from scratch, entirely in Hindi. This comprehensive course will guide you step-by-step through the basics of Swift programming and the SwiftUI framework, empowering you to create stunning and functional iOS applications.
What You'll Learn:
Introduction to Swift Programming: Understand the fundamentals of Swift, including variables, data types, control flow, functions, and more. Build a strong foundation that will support your journey in app development.
Mastering SwiftUI: Learn how to create modern, responsive user interfaces using SwiftUI. Discover the power of declarative syntax and how it simplifies UI development.
Practical Projects: Apply your knowledge by building a series of hands-on projects. Each project is designed to reinforce your learning and give you practical experience.
Projects Included:
To-Do App: Create a simple and effective task management app. Learn how to add, delete, and manage tasks with SwiftUI.
News App: Develop a dynamic news application that fetches and displays the latest news articles. Understand how to work with APIs and SwiftUI to build a functional news feed.
SwiftData App: Dive into data management with SwiftData. Learn how to store, retrieve, and manipulate data within your app, ensuring a seamless user experience.
In-App Purchase Book Store App: Create a book store app that includes in-app purchases. Understand how to implement and manage in-app purchases, enabling users to buy and access additional content.
Why This Course?
Hindi Instruction: All lessons are delivered in Hindi, making it easier for native speakers to grasp complex concepts and follow along with ease.
Step-by-Step Guidance: Each module is designed to build on the previous one, ensuring a smooth and logical progression through the material.
Real-World Applications: The projects you will build are not only educational but also practical, giving you experience that you can showcase in your portfolio.
Community Support: Join a community of fellow learners, ask questions, share your progress, and get feedback from peers and instructors.
By the end of this course, you will have a solid understanding of Swift and SwiftUI, along with the confidence to build and publish your own iOS apps. Whether you are a complete beginner or looking to enhance your programming skills, this course is the perfect starting point.
Enroll now and take the first step towards becoming a proficient iOS developer!
Language: Hindi
Instructor: Vipin Sharma
target_audience: Beginner Programmers: Those with a basic understanding of programming who want to learn Swift and SwiftUI from the ground up.
Students and Educators: Learners in academic settings who are looking to complement their studies with practical iOS development skills.
Aspiring iOS Developers: Individuals who are new to iOS development and want to start building their own apps using SwiftUI.

courses.title: Complete Android App Development With Kotlin Course In Hindi
courses.bio: Master Kotlin And Android App Development From Beginner To Advanced - 12+ Chapters - Calculator And Login App Project
objectives: Kotlin Language For App Development
Build Fully Functional Android Apps: Learners will acquire the skills to design and develop fully functional Android applications from scratch using Kotlin.
Understand Android Studio and Development Tools: Learners will learn how to effectively use Android Studio, Gradle, and other essential tools.
Grasp Knowledge Of Kotlin: Along with android app development you will gain some knowledge of Kotlin as well.
Implement Real-World App Features: Learners will learn to create apps with modern functionalities like, database integration, and responsive UI/UX design.
App Projects: App tutorials for Calculator and Login App from Scratch.

Chapter 2 - Activity and Layout: 4. Intent, Explicit Intent And Implicit Intent
Chapter 3 - RecyclerView and CardView: 1. About RecyclerView, CardView, ViewHolder And Adapter

requirements: This course is absolutely for Beginners so you don't need to know anything, you will learn everything from here from Scratch.
courses.description:
Welcome to the Ultimate Course Of Android App Development With Kotlin In Hindi From Scratch which is a comprehensive course designed for Hindi-speaking learners who want to dive into the world of Android development. This course takes you step-by-step through the process of creating Android apps, starting from the basics and building up to advanced concepts.


Whether you're a complete beginner or someone with a bit of programming experience, this course will equip you with the skills to build dynamic and professional Android apps using Kotlin, the official language for Android development.


Mostly all of the topics have been covered in this course with decent and easiest explanation of each and every topic so there is no way you will get stuck somewhere and even if you will get stuck then feel free to ask questions in comment.


By the end of this course, you'll have a solid foundation in Android app development and the confidence to create and publish your own apps.


What you'll learn:
• Kotlin programming for Android.
• Understanding Android Studio and its tools.
• Creating interactive user interfaces.
• Connecting apps to databases.
• Developing Calculator and Login App.


Start your journey as an Android developer today, and create amazing apps with Kotlin in your own language!
target_audience: Beginners who wants to become Android App Developer

courses.title: Desenvolvimento Android - Configurando o Android Studio
courses.bio: Instalando o Android Studio no MacOS, configurando um emulador com Android e conectando um celular ao ambiente

Instalação do Android Studio: Criando um novo projeto no Android Studio
Configuração de emulador Android (AVD Ma: Criando um emulador Android com o AVD Manager
Habilitando um celular Android no Androi: Ativando o modo Desenvolvedor no celular
Habilitando a depuração e instalação via USB
Rodando um aplicativo no celular Android
Instalando um aplicativo em múltiplos celulares/emuladores

requirements: Computador com requisitos básicos para instalação do Android Studio
Conexão com Internet
courses.description:
O Android Studio é o IDE oficial do Android. Ele foi criado especificamente para o Android para acelerar seu desenvolvimento e ajudá-lo a criar aplicativos da mais alta qualidade para todos os dispositivos Android. Então se você deseja iniciar no desenvolvimento de apps para Android, precisará saber todo o processo de instalação do Android Studio e configurações básicas para começar a desenvolver seus aplicativos incríveis!
Antes do nascimento do Android Studio, o desenvolvimento para Android era possível utilizando a plataforma Eclipse com o Android Development Kit (ADK), fornecido pelo Google. Necessitando a instalação de plugin para desenvolvimento Android, o Eclipse foi por muito tempo utilizado pela grande maioria da comunidade de desenvolvedores.
Baseado no IntelliJ IDEA, o Android Studio é atualmente a IDE oficial para desenvolvimento Android, mas recentemente também, incluiu um plugin para integração e desenvolvimento de aplicativos em Flutter.
Nesse curso mostro todos os steps e detalhes da instalação do Android Studio no macOS. Baixando da página oficial de desenvolvedores até a instalação pronta para desenvolvimento.
Também abordo como criar e configurar um emulador no Android Studio, baixando a imagem e configurando conforme sua necessidade, bem como a conexão de um celular Android ao ambiente de desenvolvimento, pronto para receber os aplicativos desenvolvidos.
Ao concluir esse curso você estará apto a utilizar o Android Studio como sua IDE para desenvolvimento na plataforma Android! Bons estudos!
target_audience: Qualquer pessoa que tenha interesse em se tornar um desenvolvedor Android
Qualquer pessoa que tenha interesse em se tornar um desenvolvedor mobile
Qualquer pessoa que tenha interesse em se tornar um desenvolvedor de aplicativos

courses.title: إنشاء تطبيقات موبايل إحترافية لأجهزة الآيفون وكذلك الأندرويد
courses.bio: بدون الحاجة إلى أي مهارات إضافية في معرفة الكود البرمجي يمكنك أن تصبح خبير في بناء تطبيقات الموبايل بإستخدامم أبي باي
requirements: إتصال بالإنترت
جهاز كمبيوتر أو لابتوب للعمل
هاتف ذكي لمعاينة التطبيق بشكل عملي
courses.description:
كل مدون ومالك لموقع  أو مدير موقع لمجلة إلكترونية أو من لديه متجر إلكتروني لديهم سؤال في أذهانهم حول كيفية إنشاء تطبيق للهاتف المحمول وبأنماط مختلفة نسخة تدعم الآيفون وتعمل على نظام أبل ونسخة أخرى تعمل على أجهزة الأندرويد لمواقعهم . الكثير من أصحاب المدونات ورواد الأعمال على الإنترنت ومصممي المواقع يعلمون كيف يقومون ببناء مواقع ويب إحترافية بإستخدام أنظمة ادارة المحتوى  بدون الحاجة لكتابة الكود البرمجي لما توفره هذه المنصات  من إضافات وخيارات عديدة جدا ورائعة.
لذلك، هل يمكن حقا  أن نبني تطبيقات موبايل إحترافية  دون معرفة العمل بالكود البرمجي ؟  والجواب هو نعم.هناك وأفكار متنوعة إلى تطبيقات ذكيه تعمل بالآيفون والأندرويد وبشكل مميز وإمكانيات رائعة مع شرح طريقة رفع التطبيق أون لاين وكذلك كيفية الإستفادة من التطبيقات في جلب الإعلانات والترافيك على موقعك  وأيضا كيف يمكنك الربح من التطبيقات التي تقوم بإنشائها  . كل ذلك وأكثر سيتم مناقشته في هذه الدورة  والله ولي التوفيق للجميع
أبي باي هي منصة تعمل اون لاين وتساعدك على عمل اي تطبيق  دون الحاجة لكتابة الكود البرمجي  وتعمل على  تحويل المحتوى سواء أكان مدوتة / موقع / مجلة / متجر إلى تطبيق ذكي للمحمول وكذلك موقع للتطبيق.
فهو يساعدك على إنشاء إصدار التطبيق المحمول الأصلي  لكل من الآيفون والأندرويد وبشكل إحترافي  مما يعني أنك يمكن أن تأخذ في الواقع هذه التطبيقات وتتمكن من تحميلها إلى المتجر الخاص بها في أبل بلاي وجوجل بلاي ، وبالتالي يمكن للزوار تحميل التطبيق الخاص بك مباشرة إلى هواتفهم الذكية.
مميزات أبي باي
المعاينة المباشرة للتطبيق
المرونة من حيث المزيد من التخصيص
إنشاء التطبيق لكل من أنظمة الأبل آيفون وكذلك أنظمة الأندرويد
لا حاجة إطلاقا  إلى المعرفة بالبرمجة والأكواد البرمجية
يمكنك من تحقيق دخل من تطبيقك باستخدام إعلانات أدموب
target_audience: رواد الأعمال على شبكة الإنترت
مصممي ومطوري مواقع الويب
المبرمجين والمطورين وكذلك
غير المبرمجين الذين لا توجد لديهم اي خبرة سابقة في البرمجة
لكل مهتم في مجال تطوير التطبيقات الذكية للمواقع والأفكار الإبداعية بدون كتابة الكود البرمجي

courses.description:
Crea un Clon de InDriver y UBER desde cero
Desarrollo Multiplataforma Android y iOS utilizando Clean Architecture + BloC con Backend y Base de datos
En este curso te voy a enseñar como crear una aplicación de TRANSPORTE tipo InDriver O UBER utilizando FLUTTER junto con Laravel, MYSQL y Socket IO
Aprende a programar con un Senior Developer combinando las mejores tecnologías que tiene Flutter actualmente para desarrollar apps Multiplataforma:


APP


Diseño de pantallas
Mapas de Google
Localización en tiempo real
Trazado y actualizacion de rutas
Animaciones de localizacion
Almacenamiento local
Manejo de imagenes
Peticiones HTTP
Clean Architecture
BloC (Gestor de estado)
Inyeccion de dependencias
Notificaciones Push


BACKEND


Laravel (Lenguaje PHP)
MySQL (Base de datos)
Datos espaciales con MySQL
Eloquent ORM
Socket iO (Tiempo Real)
Almacenamiento de archivos
CRUD API (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
JWT (Bearer Token)
Proteccion de rutas por ROLES de usuario
Notificaciones Push


Y MUCHO MAS!
Espero que te suscribas a mi curso y poderte brindar todo mi conocimiento sobre este interesante mundo del desarrollo móvil profesional.
Flutter:
Es un framework de código abierto desarrollado por Google para crear aplicaciones nativas de forma fácil, rápida y sencilla. Su principal ventaja radica en que genera código 100% nativo para cada plataforma, con lo que el rendimiento y la UX es totalmente idéntico a las aplicaciones nativas tradicionales.
Laravel:
Laravel es un framework PHP de código abierto diseñado para el desarrollo rápido de aplicaciones web. Utiliza un enfoque de arquitectura MVC (Modelo-Vista-Controlador) y proporciona una estructura y herramientas que facilitan la creación de aplicaciones web complejas de manera eficiente y mantenible.

courses.title: React Native Animation
courses.bio: Learn and implement with examples of animation in React Native
objectives: Learn and implement how animation works in react native
learn with easy and practical examples to implement animation in react native
debug the issues and improve the quality of animation in react native
learning from beginner to advanced
requirements: You need to have knowledge about React Native
courses.description:
Mobile apps are one of the best ways to engage with users - no wonder everyone wants to build one!


The React Native allows you to create mobile apps for Android and iOS platforms!
No need to learn Java, Android, Swift, Objective-C or anything of that - React and JavaScript are all you need to create awesome native mobile apps that work on both Android and iOS. That's probably why Instagram, Airbnb, Skype and many other global companies are using it to build their mobile apps!


But to create a great mobile app, sometimes you also need to use animations when business is required hence this course is intended for React native developers who would like to learn and implement the animations in their apps. This course will explain how to put animations and use them in the app to create great mobile apps that appeal to the users with the additional content of creating an animated payment confirmation button.




Here's a detailed look at what you'll get:
The core concepts and theory
How to use animations in the app using the React native reanimated library
Understand the step-by-step process to build animations into the apps.
How to use the react native reanimated library to create beautiful animations.
Detailed examples of how to add animations as a beginner.


What will you need to succeed in this course?
Knowledge of uses of third-party libraries in React native apps.
JavaScript and React knowledge is required though - you don't need to be an expert but the basics need to be set (though there are refresher sections in this course!)
I'd be thrilled to welcome you to the course!
target_audience: This course is for React Native developers who would like to learn animations in React Native

courses.title: Flutter: crie apps Android/iOS com novo SDK mobile do Google
courses.bio: Aprenda a criar aplicativos bonitos e com alto desempenho a partir de projetos práticos completos

Introdução: Instalando o Visual Studio Code e as extensões do Flutter
Crie seu primeiro aplicativo \"Hello Wor: Criando e executando o aplicativo usando CLI (Command Line Interface)
Usando o Visual Studio Code e Hot Reload
Aprenda conceitos básicos de Flutter imp: O que você desenvolverá nesta seção.
Criando o projeto da seção usando CLI (Terminal)
Programação Orientada a Objetos - Classes e Objetos (Conceitos)
Programação Orientada a Objetos - Classes e Objetos (Prática)
Conclusão do aplicativo e do curso

requirements: Conhecimento básico em Lógica de Programação
Ter um computador com o sistema operacional Windows ou Linux ou Mac OS
courses.description:
Flutter é o novo SDK de aplicativos para dispositivos móveis desenvolvido e mantido pelo Google para criar interfaces nativas de alta qualidade tanto para o iOS quanto para o Android em tempo recorde e está sendo usado por desenvolvedores e organizações em todo o mundo, além de ser gratuito e de código aberto.
O Flutter faz uso da linguagem de programação Dart, criada também pela própria Google e que possui uma sintaxe muito similar ao Java, C# e TypeScript, ou seja, com uma única linguagem de programação você criará aplicativos nativos para Android e iOS!
Encante os seus usuários com os belos widgets usando Material Design (Android) e Cupertino (iOS) incorporados no Flutter. As APIs rich motion, a rolagem natural suave e o reconhecimento de plataformas permitirão que você  facilmente monte a sua interface com a moderna estrutura reativa do Flutter e o rico conjunto de widgets de plataforma, layout e fundação. Solucione seus desafios difíceis de interface do usuário com APIs poderosas e flexíveis para 2D, animação, gestos, efeitos e muito mais!
A função hot reload do Flutter ajuda você a experimentar com rapidez e facilidade a construção de interfaces de usuário, adicionando recursos e corrigindo erros mais rapidamente. Experimente tempos de recarga de sub-segundo, sem perder tempo em emuladores, simuladores e hardware do iOS e Android.
Assista aulas disponibilizadas gratuitamente neste curso e saiba mais sobre tudo que você conseguirá desenvolver de maneira rápida e eficiente!
É importante lembrar que os cursos gratuitos na Udemy podem ter duração máxima de 2 horas e este curso tem 1 hora e 56 minutos de vídeo aulas.
Meu nome é Henrique Dezani, sou professor universitário na área de computação há mais de 12 anos e desenvolvedor mobile desde a época de programação anteriores ao Android e iOS (usando Java Micro Edition). Posso dizer que esta tecnologia me impressionou muito pela sua facilidade e eficiência e, por isso, além de ensinar, sou um grande entusiasta e colaborador deste projeto. Espero que aproveite bem o curso e possa transformar sua ideia em uma aplicativo de sucesso.
target_audience: Todos que querem desenvolver aplicativos de maneira fácil e com ótimo desempenho.

Ordinateur avec connexion Internet wifi
Téléphone ou tablette sous Android

Adresse Gmail
courses.description:
Créez vos premières applications mobiles et initiez-vous à la programmation !
Ce cours a été particulièrement conçu pour les débutants en programmation et/ou les profils non-techniques, intéressés par cet univers mais ne sachant pas forcément par où commencer.

Vous êtes au bon endroit !
Elaboré sur la base de mon expérience personnelle d'apprentissage de la programmation à partir d'un autre métier d'origine, ce cours délivre une formation efficace et concrète. Il vous permet la réalisation immédiate d'applications fonctionnelles en explorant une multitude de thématiques d'usage :
- Basé sur App Inventor, logiciel open-source de formation à Android conçu par Google et le MIT, il permet l'apprentissage de la logique de la programmation grâce à la programmation visuelle, sans être tout de suite noyé dans le jargon technique d'un langage particulier.
- Orienté projet : chaque section du cours consiste en la réalisation de bout en bout d'une application complète, du maquettage à l'installation finale sur le téléphone ou la tablette en passant par la création de l'interface utilisateur, le test pendant le développement et la programmation.
A la fin de ce cours, vous serez capable de :
- Créer vos propres applications simples
- Prototyper en toute autonomie des applications plus complexes, dans un cadre professionnel par exemple, pour un gain de temps et d'efficacité
- Collaborer plus efficacement avec des développeurs professionnels
- Savoir utiliser et intégrer le mobile dans vos projets personnels, créatifs ou pédagogiques
- Si vous souhaitez aller plus loin dans la programmation, la diversité des sujets abordés vous permettra de mieux préciser vos envies ou besoins, et ainsi de mieux savoir vers quel langage ou formation complémentaire vous orienter.
Types de contenu inclus :
- Réalisation de 7 applications sur une variété de thématiques : traduction instantanée, photo / dessin / partage, sms, géolocalisation, jeu, vote en temps réel, enquête en ligne.
- Contenus disponibles : vidéos de réalisation et de programmation en direct des applications et supports complémentaires d'explications, de conseils et de bonnes pratiques de conception et de développement. Exercices complémentaires dans les premières sections pour s'exercer et aller plus loin.
Il est recommandé de suivre le cours de manière linéaire et chronologique, car les notions abordées suivent cet ordre de progression : les bases sont détaillées au début, et une fois qu'une notion est abordée en détail, elle est réutilisée dans d'autres sections / sessions sans être réexpliquée. Il vaut donc mieux suivre le cours dans l'ordre.
Les séquences sont néanmoins modulaires pour vous permettre de revenir sur des notions spécifiques que vous souhaiteriez revoir.
Temps nécessaire :
- La réalisation d'une application devrait prendre entre 2 heures et 5 heures de temps en moyenne, selon la rapidité et les connaissances préalables de chacun.
- Sur cette base, l'ensemble du cours devrait vous prendre entre 15 heures et 40 heures, selon le temps que vous choisirez de consacrer aux exercices complémentaires proposés et aux possibilités que vous aurez envie d'explorer.
target_audience: Débutants en programmation
Profils non-techniques souhaitant s'initier à la programmation
Débutants en création d'applications mobiles
Personnes ayant des projets d'applications mobiles et souhaitant davantage d'autonomie et d'efficacité dans leur collaboration avec des professionnels

requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência com programação. Você aprenderá tudo o que precisa saber.
Sugerido: conhecer como funciona a plataforma do OutSystems
courses.description:
Este curso apresenta os primeiros passos e conceitos iniciais para quem está começando a desenvolver utilizando OutSystems focado em Mobile, sem precisar ter conhecimento prévio em outra linguagem de programação.


Nele vamos dar continuidade no desenvolvimento usando um projeto base feito no curso de OutSystems - Começando com Mobile #1.


Não é obrigatório que tenha realizado o primeiro curso, mas ajudaria no entendimento do que foi feito até o momento.


É preferível que tenha conhecimento básico dos conceitos do OutSystems, pois será apresentado diversas implementações dele.


Vamos nos aprofundar na ferramenta, criando novas funcionalidades, trabalhando com menus, manipulação das entidades e local storage (muito utilizado em aplicações mobile). Desenvolvendo exemplos funcionais como backup e rascunho


No final do curso, será possível efetuar o download do projeto desenvolvido com tudo que foi feito no processo. Sintam-se livres para manipular e aprimorar o projeto final.


Não é necessário ter conhecimento prévio com programação, pelo menos neste momento, por ser uma ferramenta Low-Code. Mas caso conheça JavaScript e CSS, vai ser de grande ajuda em alguns termos utilizados.


Espero que gostem do curso, a ideia é passar a experiencia e os conceitos que obtive até o momento e que acredito que ajudará quem estiver começando.
target_audience: Iniciantes que desejam aprender OutSystems

requirements: Experiencia básica creando APIs con nodejs y express
Flutter nivel básico
Consumir una API desde flutter
courses.description:
Este es un curso para aquellos que buscan alternativas a Firebase Storage. En este curso conocerás las mejores alternativas a Firebase Storage, a crear el backend con node.js, typescript y express.js para comunicarnos con la API de DigitalOcean Spaces. Después comunicaremos una app flutter con nuestro backend para subir archivos a nuestro space, obtener un enlace para visualizar un archivo privado y a eliminar el archivos de nuestro space desde nuestra app.


Qué aprenderás en este curso:
- Conocerás las mejores alternativas a Firebase Storage.
- Los beneficios de utilizar Digital Ocean Spaces.
- Crear el backend con node.js, typescript y express.js para comunicarnos con la API de Digital Ocean Spaces.
- Utilizar clean architecture en nuestro backend con inyección de dependencias.
- Utilizar el SDK de AWS con node.js para comunicarnos con nuestro space de Digital Ocean.
- Configurar un CDN en nuestro space de Digital Ocean.
- Crear un enlace de carga para subir archivos desde una web, una app móvil o cualquier cliente.
- Subir archivos de forma pública o privada.
- Comunicar nuestra app flutter con null safety usando el patrón repositorio con nuestro backend.
- Configurar el plugin flutter_uploader en iOS y Android para subir archivos.
- Visualizar el progreso de carga desde la app.
- Eliminar un archivo desde la app.
- Obtener un enlace para visualizar un archivo privado desde la app.
- Tips de experiencia de usuario.
- y mucho más.

Crear aplicaciones y juegos en iOS se ha convertido en una excelente opción de emprendimiento e ingresos adicionales, por eso este curso ofrece los conceptos teórico prácticos necesarios para crear juegos básicos en Swift 2 la última versión publicada y Sprite Kit como FrameWork de juegos.

El curso además de la constante actualización y asesoría en la creación de sus proyectos cuenta con la garantía de devolución de dinero si no estas a gusto o crees que no vale tu inversión, así que vale la pena que te motives a crear tu primer juego

courses.title: Başlangıç Seviye SQL Çalışma Soru Seti 1
courses.bio: Veritabanı yönetimi ve SQL sorgulama becerilerinizi geliştirin. Temel komutlardan veri analizine kadar adım adım öğrenin
courses.description:
Bu SQL çalışma soru seti, SQL diline yeni başlayanlar için hazırlanmış kapsamlı bir öğrenme aracıdır. Öğrenciler bu setle, SQL’in temel kavramlarını ve komutlarını öğrenirken aynı zamanda pratik yaparak bilgilerini pekiştirecekler. Soru seti; veri sorgulama, veri manipülasyonu, koşul kullanımı, tablo yönetimi ve sıralama gibi SQL’in temel yapı taşlarını içermektedir.
SQL (Structured Query Language), veritabanlarıyla etkileşimde bulunmak için kullanılan standart bir programlama dilidir.
Her soruda gerçek hayatta karşılaşılabilecek durumlar üzerine odaklanılmış ve SQL sorguları üzerinden çözümler geliştirilmiştir. Öğrenciler, SQL komutlarıyla nasıl etkili veri çekebileceklerini, tablolar arasında ilişki kurarak nasıl veri sorgulayabileceklerini ve SQL ile nasıl anlamlı raporlar hazırlayabileceklerini bu soru seti sayesinde deneyimleyecekler.


Ayrıca, bu set, SQL sorgulama becerilerini geliştirmek ve veritabanı yönetimi üzerine güçlü bir temel oluşturmak isteyen herkes için mükemmel bir başlangıç noktasıdır. SQL becerileri iş dünyasında büyük önem taşır ve bu çalışma seti, bu becerilerin pratik bir şekilde kazanılmasına yardımcı olacaktır. Kendi hızınızda ilerleyebilir ve her soruyu çözerek SQL bilgilerinizi bir üst seviyeye taşıyabilirsiniz.
SQL, çok çeşitli sektörlerde veri yönetimi ve işlenmesi için kritik bir rol oynamaktadır. Web geliştirmeden iş zekasına, bankacılıktan oyun geliştirmeye kadar, veriyle çalışan her alanda SQL büyük bir önem taşır. Hem küçük ölçekli projeler hem de büyük veri tabanlarına sahip sistemlerde SQL vazgeçilmez bir araçtır.
Setin sonunda, öğrendiklerinizi gerçek dünyada uygulayabilir, iş dünyasında ihtiyaç duyacağınız veri yönetim ve analiz becerilerini geliştirebilirsiniz.
Başarılar dileriz!
target_audience: Bu kurs, SQL öğrenmek isteyen tüm bireylere yöneliktir. Veritabanı yönetimi, veri analizi ve SQL sorgulama becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen yeni başlayanlar, öğrenciler ve iş profesyonelleri için uygundur. Ayrıca, yazılım geliştirme, veri bilimi veya iş zekası alanlarında kariyer yapmak isteyenler ya da bu alanlarda çalışan ve SQL becerilerini pekiştirmek isteyenler için idealdir. SQL bilgisine sahip olmayan herkes, bu kursla güçlü bir temel oluşturabilir.

courses.title: Kurs Android
courses.bio: tworzenie własnych aplikacji
objectives: umiejętność tworzenia prostych aplikacji
requirements: obsługa komputera
courses.description:
Czy wydałeś już kilkaset złotych na książki, które spowodowały, że znasz kilka ciekawych regułek bez możliwości zastosowania ich w praktyce? A może trafiłeś na jedną z tych, które pokazują np. jak zrobić super grę 3D krok po kroku? Pewnie spotkałeś też treści w stylu: „… tą część listingu pomijamy, gdyż wykracza ona poza poziom tutaj prezentowany … całość listingu możesz pobrać tu i tu …”. Ładny spis treści, ładna cena i brak efektów.
Poświęcone pieniądze, czas i nerwy tylko po to, żeby wiedzieć, że nic się nie wie. Ewentualnie przepisać bez zrozumienia jedną jedyną grę zgodnie z pobranym listingiem.
Jako posiadacz telefonu z androidem i zwykły użytkownik, nie chcę pisać gier 3D, czy typowych aplikacji. W cenie książek kupię ich dziesiątki i zaoszczędzę czas. Więc do czego chciałbym wykorzystać możliwości androida? Do personalizowania swojego telefonu.
Chciałbym zrobić program, który praktyczny byłby tylko dla mnie, np. pokazujący na wykresie zużycie energii tylko na podstawie odczytu licznika, z prognozą na kolejne miesiące.
Przydał by mi się także program, śledzący tytuły i ilość czytanych przeze mnie książek, oraz przypominający o brakach w tej materii.
A Ty jak chciałbyś zwiększyć możliwości swojego telefonu?
Nie odpowiem ci na to pytanie, także ten kurs nie da ci gotowego rozwiązania. Skoro wiesz już jaki masz cel, potrzebujesz jedynie poznać elementy, za pomocą których go osiągniesz.
W przypadku androida musisz mieć odpowiednie środowisko programistyczne i przede wszystkim znać sposoby komunikacji z użytkownikiem.
Odpowiednie algorytmy stosujesz pewnie na co dzień np. zapisując na kartce stan licznika i odpowiednio obliczając miesięczne, a później roczne zużycie energii. Jak nie znasz wzorów, wystarczy popularna wyszukiwarka internetowa i po problemie.
Jedyną przeszkodą jest pobranie odpowiednich danych a następnie ich prezentacja na ekranie telefonu. Tutaj też pomocna może być wyszukiwarka. Jednak aby znaleźć sposób na narysowanie odpowiednich kształtów na swoim wykresie, będziesz musiał przebrnąć przez setki nieznanych obiektów, aż trafisz na ten właściwy. Ktoś to zrobił już za Ciebie.
Kurs pokazuje w praktyczny sposób, jak posługiwać się poszczególnymi elementami i jak odpowiednio przechwytywać informacje od użytkownika i przekazywać je do innych obiektów oraz jak rysować po ekranie telefonu. Szczególny nacisk położono tutaj na zrozumienie mechanizmów nie na fajerwerki. Efekty specjalnie, to Twoja działka
target_audience: Początkujący programiści, chcący tworzyć aplikację na system Android

courses.description:
Welcome to the ultimate guide to building mobile applications for iOS, Android, and the web using the Flutter framework and Dart programming language. With Flutter, you can build high-performance and visually appealing native mobile applications with just one codebase. This means you don't have to learn separate languages like Swift, Java, or Kotlin for building apps for different platforms.
Flutter is an open-source Google-developed framework that uses Dart as its programming language to create fast and beautiful apps. Flutter offers pre-built widgets that make it easier for developers to compose user interfaces and its SDK can compile Dart code into native code.
This comprehensive course is designed for beginners with no prior knowledge of either Flutter or Dart. You don't need any experience with Android or iOS development as Flutter allows you to learn just one language. The course covers both theoretical and practical aspects, and you will build a complete, realistic app with core basics and advanced features such as state management, native functionality, animations, clean code writing, and much more.
Here's what you'll learn in this course:
Basic overview of Flutter and Dart
Complete guide to setting up Flutter on Mac and Windows OS
Dart programming basics, including variables, final and const, functions, conditional flow statements, classes and objects, constructors, inheritance, polymorphism, abstract classes, and more.
Working with stateless and stateful widgets
Building custom widgets and working with layout widgets
Simple navigation and named routes
Passing data between screens using constructors and named routes
Forms and validation
State management using the Provider package
Working with Firebase, including Firebase Authentication email password service for sign-in, sign-up, reset password, change password, and logout.
Error handling
Using the native file explorer to pick image files
Working with Firebase Storage to store, view, and download images
Working with Firebase Real-time Database
Managing the navigation stack of the application
Writing clean and scalable code like a pro


In this course you will also learn about Open AI APIs, such as Chat Generation API, Dall-E API, Edit Generation API.
You will learn all this by doing, we will build 3 chatbots in course:
Building Text Chatbot using Chat Generation API, GPT-3.
Building Image Chatbot using Dall-E Open AI APIs.
Building Text correction Chatbot using Edit Generation API.
Don't just take our word for it - here are some reviews from our former students:
"I am blown away by how much I've learned from this Flutter course. The material was presented in an easy-to-understand way, and the instructor was knowledgeable and engaging. I would definitely recommend this course to anyone interested in learning Flutter." - Cahyono
"An excellent tutorial that goes straight to the point. Anmol is a true expert, and I would recommend this course to anyone looking to learn Flutter and Dart." - Helvecio Borges Guimarães
"100% recommended for anyone looking for a new course on Flutter and Dart. Engaging and well-explained. Great work!" - Innon tech
The course assumes no prior programming knowledge, but it is beneficial to have a fundamental understanding of programming. You don't need any prior experience with Flutter or Dart, iOS (Swift/Objective-C), or Android (Java).
We're so confident that you'll love this course that we're offering a full 30-day money-back guarantee. Enroll today and start building beautiful and high-performance native mobile applications with Flutter!

courses.description:
The main goal of this course is to train you to perform complex NLP tasks (and build intelligent language applications) using Deep Learning with PyTorch.
You will build two complete real-world NLP applications throughout the course. The first application is a Sentiment Analyzer that analyzes data to determine whether a review is positive or negative towards a particular movie. You will then create an advanced Neural Translation Machine that is a speech translation engine, using Sequence to Sequence models with the speed and flexibility of PyTorch to translate given text into different languages.
By the end of the course, you will have the skills to build your own real-world NLP models using PyTorch's Deep Learning capabilities.
This course uses Python 3.6, Pytorch 1.0, NLTK 3.3.0, and Spacy 2.0 , while not the latest version available, it provides relevant and informative content for legacy users of PyTorch.
About the Author:
Jibin  Mathew is a Tech-Entrepreneur, Artificial Intelligence enthusiast and  an active researcher. He has spent several years as a Software Solutions  Architect, with a focus on Artificial Intelligence for the past 5  years. He has architected and built various solutions in Artificial  Intelligence which includes solutions in Computer Vision, Natural  Language Processing/Understanding and Data sciences, pushing the limits  of computational performance and model accuracies. He is well versed  with concepts in Machine learning and Deep learning and serves a  consultant for clients from Retail, Environment, Finance and Health  care.

courses.description:
Mastering SwiftData for iOS: A Complete Guide to Data Management in Swift & SwiftUI
Unlock the full potential of SwiftData for iOS app development in this comprehensive course. Learn how to seamlessly integrate SwiftData with Swift and SwiftUI to build dynamic, data-driven iOS apps. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced iOS developer, this course will provide you with the essential skills needed to master modern data management techniques using Apple's powerful SwiftData framework.
Course Highlights:
SwiftData Fundamentals: Understand the core concepts of attributes, queries, fetch requests, and relationships to build efficient data models.
CRUD Operations: Learn to execute create, read, update, and delete operations with SwiftData's powerful tools for persistent data handling.
CloudKit Integration: Easily integrate CloudKit for seamless cloud-based storage and synchronization in your iOS apps.
MVVM & SwiftData: Understand the MVVM design pattern and explore its benefits in data-driven SwiftData apps. Discover how MVVM can help scale complex applications.
Queries, Filters, and Sorting: Use predicates, sort descriptors, and powerful fetch requests to filter and organize data efficiently.
Undo/Redo Manager: Implement the Undo/Redo feature and create a “Shake to Undo/Redo” functionality for better user experience.
Store Images with .externalStorage: Learn to manage image storage in apps by utilizing external storage options for better efficiency.
Dynamic SwiftUI Bindings: Bind SwiftData to SwiftUI components, dynamically updating views and managing state changes in real-time.
Performance Optimization: Use asynchronous data fetching and background processing to enhance performance and user experience.
Fun Projects: Build creative apps, such as a Mesh Gradient Editor, complete with code drag-and-drop functionality.
Why Take This Course?
This course offers practical, project-based learning, ensuring that you gain hands-on experience with SwiftData in real-world scenarios. Regularly updated with new projects and techniques, you’ll have the opportunity to stay on top of the latest trends and advancements in iOS development and SwiftUI.
By the end of this course, you'll have the skills and confidence to create data-rich iOS apps using SwiftData, SwiftUI, and CloudKit. Whether you're looking to build apps for personal use or aiming to launch them on the App Store, this course will give you the tools to succeed.
Happy Coding!
Ron
target_audience: iOS developers looking to master Swift Data for persistent storage
Anyone who wants to be creative and develop exciting apps using SwiftData.

I really like the approach of this course about the Android app. In this course, the instructor focuses on the Android SDK to teach you how to build beautiful applications for smartphones. As the course title indicates, it is the complete guide to learning android application development.

The Android platform is increasingly popular with developers and a dominant force in the global smartphone market. As more businesses develop mobile apps for customer engagement, Android development skills are likely to stay in high demand.
Android development is a software creation process that focuses on applications, better known as apps, that are compatible with devices running the Android operating system (OS). Because Android is an open-source project, developers have easy access to the Android software development kit (SDK). Many use this kit in conjunction with Kotlin, Java, and C++ programming languages to make their apps. The Android SDK tools compile your code along with any data and resource files into an APK, or Android package, which is an archive file that uses an .apk suffix. One APK file contains all Android app contents used by devices to install your app. When the app is complete and ready for release, Android developers can upload their apps to the Google Play Store for users to download for android game development.

Chances are, you’ve heard of Android many times, and Do u want to android developer? You may even have an Android smartphone, app android tablet, watch, or TV. But what is Android? Android is a mobile operating system (OS) that was designed and developed by Google. The Android OS is Linux kernel-based. So, what’s “Linux kernel,” and why is that such an essential detail about Android Development?
In a nutshell, Linux kernel is an OS, well, sort of — it’s partially an OS. More like a small part of an OS, but an important one. The Linux kernel is the layer responsible for interfacing with the device’s hardware and managing the device’s CPU and memory. The Android OS is Linux kernel-based because the Linux kernel allows for a more open and customizable OS, which is what Android promotes — any device manufacturer can take the Android OS and make it their own.

Imagine how bad it would be if, say, resources from application A read information from another application’s files and vice versa with no constraints — malicious, insecure interactions would take hold and bring the whole system to a halt.
The sharing of information (data) between applications is an essential part of building inter-connected applications, so the android OS requires developers to set permissions that users must grant to do certain things. For example, for an application to access the phone’s File System (internal files), the user must give access first. This means the app developer must let the user know, in advance, what the app they are installing wants to access. For example, when a user installs an android app that needs to access the photo gallery or the phone’s camera, the app will ask for permission to access the gallery or the camera. The app user has the power to either grant or deny permission. App permissions in Android ensure the user’s protection from malware and software viruses.

Android development is a software creation process that focuses on applications, better known as apps, that are compatible with devices running the Android operating system (OS). Because Android is an open-source project, developers have easy access to the Android software development kit (SDK). Many use this kit in conjunction with Kotlin, Java, and C++ programming languages to make their apps. The Android SDK tools compile your code along with any data and resource files into an APK, or Android package, which is an archive file that uses an .apk suffix. One APK file contains all Android app contents used by devices to install your app. When the app is complete and ready for release, Android developers can upload their apps to the Google Play Store for users to download.
What are some of the important tools for Android Development?
The tools you will use for Android development depend on how you would like to focus your career as an Android developer. If you plan on focusing on native Android app development, you should know one or more of three programming languages: Java, Kotlin, and C++. Java and Kotlin are popular with a number of organizations that build their app natively. C++ is the popular choice amongst developers who build high-performance games or plan on doing entry-level SDK work. Some employers seek out Android developers that can create multiple platforms at the same time using programming frameworks like Flutter or React Native. If you are working with Flutter, you will also need to know Dart. If you are working with React Native, you will most likely also need JavaScript programming knowledge.
Is Android Development a good career?
With over 2.5 billion active Android users globally, Android development is a valuable skill that can help you enhance your career. Android development skills are in-demand around the world with various organizations across a broad range of industries. When these organizations build Android apps natively, the top three programming languages are typically Java, Kotlin, and C++. You can also look for a job in Android development that uses cross-platform solutions like Flutter or React Native. Whether you're inspired to add a new language to your repertoire or prepare for an interview, you can find a ton of online resources on sites like OAK Academy to keep your Android skills well-rounded.
Is Kotlin or Java better for Android Development?
If you are building new Android apps, Kotlin is better suited because it is the recommended programming language for Android. If you are a first-time programmer, Kotlin android is also a better choice as it has safety features and concise syntax that will help you focus on learning core program fundamentals. You should note that in some cases, employers may seek out Android developers that have Java programming skills. For example, if you plan on joining an organization that already has an Android app, they may already be using Java. If they already have an app written in Java, it is unlikely they will want to redesign the app in a different language, such as android kotlin. Therefore, you should look at the job requirements to see if the job posting you are interested in lists Java as a required skill.
What’s important

courses.description:
### Update on dec 27th with two new apps; more are on the way.
### A new section called Livecode cookbook is coming very early next year: there you will find a set of recipes to solve everyday programming problems that don't require a full sample app but still can create non trivial challenges to your everyday livecoding. If you have any particular topic that you would like to see in this section just get in touch: we'll see if it can be covered !
________________________________________________________________________
This course will teach you how to develop apps for iOS and Android using Livecode.
Learn app development for iOS and Android using Livecode's natural language
Learn how to download and set up Livecode's free version
Create a fast and efficient Android device simulator that really works
Learn how to adapt your apps to any screen resolution with just 1 line command
6 complete apps built step by step and fully explained
Develop apps for iOS and Android in 1/10th of the time needed using traditional SDKs
These are the main benefits of developing apps with Livecode:
Easy-to-use English-like programming language; accessible to anybody
Code once and deliver on iOS and Android
Apps can be adapted to any screen size with one command
Development time is a fraction compared to traditional SDKs
Apps are not slow html: they are fast and native compiled apps
Free Livecode version is available for learning
Livecode is a unique platform that allows to develop apps for Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS and Android using a very simple, yet sophisticated, programming language: English. By learning one language you will be able to develop apps for all the major operating systems and devices on the market, hence the motto "one language to rule them all". However, this course is focused on developing apps for mobile devices
Forget Java or Objective-C's intricacies: Livecode's programming language has been designed to be as close as possible to the English language. For example to display the word "hello" on screen you would write put "hello" into field "display". We have computers that recognize fingerprints and human voice, so why shouldn't we be able to create apps using our natural language ?
Apps developed with Livecode can automatically adapt to any screen size and rescale with just one line command: this alone is huge bonus for mobile developers who are often confronted with a plethora of screen sizes and proportion.
Actually Livecode is a fully integrated development environment (IDE) that contains all the tools you need to develop professional apps in a fraction of the time that would normally be required using traditional programming languages and SDKs.
No previous programming experience is required, the course starts from the very beginning and takes you till the development of real apps that can be tested on software simulators or installed on physical devices.
The course will lead you through the development of 6 real apps for Android and iOS devices. At the moment you can see only Finger Catch in the curricilum, but the other ones will come by the end of November (Currency Conversion, Tic Tac Toe, RSS Reader, Countdown Timer, Tripmaster and Portable Movie Player); just Udemy dosn't allow sections with "upcoming" lectures so I had to remove them from the curriculum.
Also, you will learn how to set up a working and efficient Android device simulator that really works for testing (if anybody tried to use Google's simulator you know what the issues are). This simulator will work smoothly also with other development tools, not just Livecode and could be worth the course by itself !
One more thing: Livecode and the simulator can be downloaded for free, so you can learn and save money. You'll need Livecode's paying version only later, if you wish to lock and compile your apps for App Store distribution.
If you're still uncertain and want to have a peek at Livecode's possibilities before enrolling this course you can enroll my free Livecode entry-level course; you'll create a clone of the Flappy Bird game in less than the duration of a football match !
Finally, with your support and feedback this course will have the chance to be extended and cover the most advanced Livecode features like sql databases and Cocoa interaction. Once you enroll the course it's yours forever, so you'll have access also to every new topic at no additional cost.
Yes, app development can bring you additional income but can also be fun !
target_audience: Anybody wishing to create apps for iOS and Android devices
Non-programmers who want to start creating their own apps (and learn how to program)
iOS and Android programmers looking for a new tool that could dramatically increase their productivity and allow for faster app development
Livecode programmers who don't have yet an expertise in developing apps for mobile platforms

courses.description:
When Apple announced SwiftUI at WWDC developers throughout the world knew that it would change everything.
As time goes by, we will quickly see SwiftUI become the standard way to build apps, eventually replacing UIKit.
SWIFTUI CHANGES EVERYTHING
Everything you know about building interfaces has changed with SwiftUI.
No more Storyboards
No more Segues
No more View Controllers
No more long build times for UI changes
If you have ever developed in Flutter and Dart you will find SwiftUI similar and refreshing. You now build reactive components and can watch the changes in real time (no more manually building for each change).
WHAT YOU'LL LEARN
This course is designed for Swift developers who want to get a quick handle on Swift UI. Here are some of the things we will cover in the course:
Simple components
Working with data
Progress bars
Working with lists
Moving around data
Opaque types
Working with State
Working with forms and data
App navigation
ObservableObjects
and more
The goal of this course is to get you up and running quickly with SwiftUI. It also comes with projects that will help you retain what you have learned.
Let's get started!
